nodes.text: Dykara was a smuggler and commentator on Gundark's Gear Datalog during the early years of the New Republic. Dykara commented on the entry for the Model B22 hold-out blaster pistol, noting it was deadly in the right hands despite its dainty appearance. Dykara once managed to convince a squad of stormtroopers that they were being fired on by two people at once by using an E-11/S blaster rifle. During a smuggling run to Neftali, Dykara had the opportunity to witness Kaori Batta demonstrate the EXP-7(a) Predator.
